transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Mr. Prince, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi, Muskan ki manager. Kaise hain aap sir?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji madam boliye, theek hoon.
Executive: Actually sir, mere paas concern receive hua tha, aapne Muskan ko kaha ki aapko refund chahiye, right?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji madam.
Executive: Sir, main jaan sakti hoon exact kya reason hai, I need to assure you ki aapko achha...?
Customer: Main batata hoon aapko actually kya hai jo abhi jo mere father hai na, unhone aur kaam shuru kiya hai, ye band kar diya abhi aapka. Jo mere chacha ji the na, unka kaam chala rahe the.
Executive: Sir, ye teen mahine mein aapne apna kaam band kar diya?
Customer: Madam, bata to raha hoon jo pehle kaam mein chacha ji saath mein the kaam mein, abhi unko suna diya ye wala kaam. Abhi hum hum log dusra kaam kar rahe hain. To isliye ye wala kaam band karke hum log, wo unka wo to unka kaam ho jayega phir. Hum nahi daal sakte na unka kaam.
Customer: To isliye abhi...
Executive: Nahi, to ye kaam kis, sir, ek baat mujhe batao, ye jo GST hai, ye kiske naam par hai?
Customer: Kya madam?
Executive: Ye jo GST hai, JR Polychem ka, ye kiske naam par hai?
Customer: Hamare hi naam pe hai.
Executive: To sir, ye GST aapke naam par hai, phir chacha ka isse kya connection hai?
Customer: Nahi madam, hum log apni firm hi band kar rahe hain na.
Executive: Aap apna GST cancel kar rahe ho?
Customer: Wo baad ki baat hai, wo to GST to baad ki baat hai jab business hi close ho raha hai, wo to chacha ka abhi jo hum...
Executive: Sir, I agree with you, but ek bas wahi baat bolna chahungi.
Customer: Sir, madam wo baat samajh gaye, aap ye kehna chah rahe ho.
Executive: Sir, aap samjha dijiye.
Customer: Madam, main ye keh raha hoon jaise jo hamara jo marka tha na, jo trademark hai.
Customer: Wo unhone liya hua tha, phir wo compromise karke hum log kaam chala rahe the, wo bhi chala rahe the. To abhi humne settlement karke bol diya unko ki aap bhi chalao ye, hum log kuch aur kar lenge kaam.
Executive: To isliye abhi...
Executive: Matlab aapne unko kya...
Executive: Ek second, ek second, aapne unko ye bol diya hai ki aap ye Water King aap hi chalayenge, wo kuch aur kar lenge, right?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi, wo Water King unka marka tha, hum hum log saath mein chala rahe the.
Executive: Achha achha, unka Water King trademark tha jo aap use kar rahe the unke saath milkar. Abhi unhone aapse wapas le liya hai, right?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji, haan ji haan ji.
Executive: To abhi aap ispe business nahi kar sakte ho?
Customer: Haan, ab haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Okay, to sir, ye cheez to aapko humein pehle batani chahiye thi na ki aap apni water marking kisi aur ki use kar rahe hain. Teen mahine baad to ye cheezein nahi resolve hoti.
Customer: Wo to internal settlement hai hamari, wo to wo kuch likha thodi hua hai.
Executive: Sir, jis tarike se aap refund maang rahe hain na, please try to understand, that is not possible.
Executive: Hum usko wo nahi, waise nahi kar sakte hain.
Executive: Kyunki dekho sir, kyunki humne jo payment uthai thi, wo JR Polychem pe uthai thi, pehla point. Jiska GST number 038PG wala hai, theek hai? Yahan pe humne welcome call pe confirm kiya tha ki sir, ye jo GST number hai, aap hi ke naam pe hai, jisme aapne commission...
Customer: Haan, wo mere naam par hai.
Executive: Sir, suno to. I am, mujhe pata hai. To sir, agar aap ye water marking unko de rahe ho, to aap water marking yahan se hatwa dijiye. Aap business to karoge na products mein?
Customer: Nahi, abhi business to abhi hum logo ko daalna hi nahi hai IndiaMART pe, IndiaMART pe daalna hi nahi hai abhi. Wo dusra business...
Executive: Sir, dusra business wali baat hi nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi, aap galat le rahe hain sir, wo sir business wali baat nahi hai sir.
Customer: Aap keh rahe ho aapko refund dena hi nahi hai isliye aap keh rahe ho.
Executive: Sir, aisa nahi hai, but the way you are asking the refund, that is not possible. Ki mera trademark mere chacha ka tha.
Customer: Sir, aise nahi hota hai, ya to ye, dekho sir, aap pehle GST cancel kara lo. Portal pe cancel dikhega to I raise the concern team department ki bhai mere client ka GST cancel ho gaya hai, jiski wajah se wo refund maang rahe hain.
Customer: Main usi GST, usi GST pe main dusra business shuru karunga na.
Executive: Sir, to GST refund aise nahi hota. GST refund ke liye koi logic hona chahiye na. Ye thodi na chacha ka trademark tha unhone wapas le liya isliye hum refund maang rahe hain.
Customer: Nahi, main aapko ye nahi keh raha.
Executive: Aise refund nahi hota na sir.
Customer: Secondary hai, nahi nahi, aap pehli baat to suno, baat hi nahi sun rahe ho aap.
Executive: Ye batao sir.
Customer: Main keh raha hoon wo to secondary cheez hai ki mere chacha ji ne trademark wapas le liya. Sabse pehli baat to ye hai ki business close ho raha hai. To business close ho raha hai to main wo IndiaMART pe kya dikhaunga? Batao.
Executive: Sir, jab business close hoga to aapke GST bhi to cancel hoga na? To GST aise hi chalta rahega business close hai.
Customer: Aur business kar sakta hoon main. GST kya hai, aap batao mere ko trademark kya hai, product kya hai, GST se link hota hai? Itna to knowledge mere ko bhi hai.
Customer: Jo product hota hai wo GST se link hota hai?
Executive: Sir, to koi to humein aap proof doge ki ye business close ho gaya hai? Jisse hum apni team ko batayenge ki this company and firm is closed. Aise nahi hota sir ki chacha ne band kar diya to hamara business. Aise nahi hota, koi proof hota ki ye business ispe running tha, jiski wajah se band ho gaya, this is the proof. Main kaise apni team ko bolun, wo mujhse kahenge tumhe kya pata isme, aise thodi na refund hota hai. Sir, refund ke bhi reason dene hote hain na 10 ki is wajah se refund maang rahe hain.
Customer: Main kya reason doon aapko, batao mere ko?
Executive: Maine bataya na sir, agar aapka koi paas, aapke paas koi proof hai jisme likha hai ki aapka ye business close ho chuka hai to main wo proof deke refund kara dungi. Aise refund nahi hota ki trademark chacha ka tha chacha ne wapas le liya and we can't do this.
Executive: Sir, main wahi bol rahi hoon, isme is tarike se nahi hota. Let me check, main aapko batati hoon, isme aur hum kya kar sakte hain.
Customer: Ji madam, aapki team mein se mere se already mere ko paanch chaar, paanch chaar baar call aa chuka hai ki haan aapka karwa dete hain hum. Uske baad aap ye keh rahe ho mere ko?
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Aapki team mein se mere ko chaar paanch baar call aa chuka hai already ki aapka refund processing mein hai. Uske baad aap mere ko ye keh rahe ho ki ye to main check karna padega ye to.
Customer: Main to ek mahine se...
Executive: Sir, hamare yahan pe aise refund nahi hota hai. 10 mahine kis se bola aapne? Kis se bola aapne sir? Ye cheez kis se boli sir aap mujhe batao?
Customer: Batana kya hai aapko jo mere portal pe jao wahan pe hai aapka field representative jo bhi hota hai, wahi to hai.
Executive: Mere ko to mila nahi sir. Main aapse baat kar rahi hoon, kaise pata chala? 10 din se aapse baat karne ki koshish kar rahe hain sir. Phone tak to aap uthate nahi ho.
Customer: Phone, main uthata nahi hoon phone? Phir kya baat hui mere paas?
Executive: Nahi sir, kahan uthaya batao sir.
Customer: Are aapne uthaya nahi phone maine aapka?
Executive: Sir, main aapki history dekh rahi hoon, aap 10 din se refund nahi maang rahe hain jo aap bol rahe ho.
Customer: Are mere paas proof hai, main aapko bata deta hoon aap mein jo mere field...
Executive: Sir, dekho aapke paas ab koi bhi proof ho, main aapko clear bata rahi hoon, aise refund nahi hota. Aapka agar business band ho gaya hai, aap mujhe laake koi bhi proof de do ki ye dekho mera business, kyunki mere ko jitni knowledge hai, we can only judge through GST. Agar GST cancel hai to humein pata chal jata hai ki haan business closed hai. Agar iske alawa koi aap ye bol rahe hain aap GST chalu rahega aur business close hoyega to aap koi bhi aapke paas hai jahan aapka written confirmation hai that we are closing this business, to main aapko apni team ko wo deke aapka refund kara dungi, otherwise sir refund nahi hota.
Customer: Main pehle to aap thoda sa dekho, itna wo to hai.
Executive: Sir, I am so sorry Prince ji, mujhe khud pata hai paisa kaisa hota hai, but meri terms conditions ke hain. Sir, meri terms conditions hoti hai.
Customer: Dekho main bhi, dekho itna hyper hone wali baat nahi hai, main bhi CA hoon, theek hai, mere ko sara.
Executive: Sir, mere ko to ye nahi samajh mein aa raha, ek trademark ke peeche aap logon ne kaise business close kar rahe ho. Aap trademark hata do.
Customer: To product bhi nahi unka to same hi hoga.
Customer: Nahi, product bhi unhi ka tha.
Executive: Achha ruko ruko, product bhi unhi ka tha kya sir?
Customer: Haan? Humko wo product shuru karna hi nahi hai jab, tabhi to de diya unko.
Executive: Sir, ab aap mujhe ye batao, main isme aapke liye best kya kar sakti hoon? Kyunki main na ek baar discuss kar leti hoon team se aur, theek hai? Phir main aapko kal morning mein ek baar clear kar dungi sir, theek hai? Isliye main kya kara sakti hoon.
Customer: Nahi madam, main aapke, main aapse, aapse ek baar main baat karta hoon ki agar, agar mere ko aapki team wale bol rahe hain chaar paanch, main jhoot to bolunga nahi. Mere ko to, main ek mahine se laga pada hoon.
Executive: Sir, main khud chahti hoon, mujhe khud nahi samajh mein aaya. Aaj ye concern mere paas aaya, main to chahti hoon aapko pata chal jaye.
Customer: Main to laga hua hoon, main ek mahine se laga hua hoon uske upar, baat kar raha hoon aapki team mein se.
Customer: Aapke paas abhi aaya hoga lekin main to ek mahine se baat kar raha hoon. Wo mere ko bolte hain ki haan aap aapka ticket raise kar diya hai, abhi refund aapka paanch saat din mein aa jayega. Bas ek aapka call aayega, aap wo unko unse baat kar lijiye. Mere paas kabhi call aata hi aata hi nahi wo wala.
Customer: Mere paanch chhe baar already ticket raise ho chuka hai iska, mere ko to ye bataya unhone.
Executive: Koi nahi sir, main dekh leti hoon aapko batati hoon.
Executive: Koi nahi sir, main dekh ke aapko call back karti hoon, theek hai? Ek baar main baat kar leti hoon team se.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requests a refund for his subscription.

- Customer states business closed due to trademark issues.

- Customer claims team members assured refund processing.



Resolution:

- Executive explains refund process requires proof.

- Executive states GST cancellation needed for refund.

- Executive will discuss with team and call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, trademark, gst, business closure
